0: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Currency = 'EUR') / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Currency = 'CZK') AS ratio FROM customers;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
1: customers.CustomerID FROM customers INNER JOIN yearmonth ON customers.CustomerID = yearmonth.CustomerID WHERE substr(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' AND customers.Segment = 'LAM' ORDER BY yearmonth.Consumption ASC LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
2: AVG(yearmonth.Consumption) / 12 AS Average_Monthly_Consumption FROM customers INNER JOIN yearmonth ON customers.CustomerID = yearmonth.CustomerID WHERE customers.Segment = 'SME' AND substr(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) = '2013';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
3: (SELECT SUM(yearmonth.Consumption)  FROM yearmonth  INNER JOIN customers ON yearmonth.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID  WHERE customers.Currency = 'CZK'  AND SUBSTR(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) = '2012') - (SELECT SUM(yearmonth.Consumption)  FROM yearmonth  INNER JOIN customers ON yearmonth.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID  WHERE customers.Currency = 'EUR'  AND SUBSTR(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) = '2012') AS Difference_in_Consumption;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
4: SELECT SUBSTR(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) AS Year, SUM(yearmonth.Consumption) AS Total_Consumption FROM yearmonth INNER JOIN customers ON yearmonth.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID WHERE customers.Currency = 'CZK' GROUP BY SUBSTR(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUM(yearmonth.Consumption) DESC LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
5: SUBSTR(yearmonth.Date, 5, 2) AS PeakMonth FROM yearmonth INNER JOIN customers ON yearmonth.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID WHERE customers.Segment = 'SME' AND SUBSTR(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) = '2013' ORDER BY yearmonth.Consumption DESC LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
6: (SELECT AVG(ym.Consumption) AS SME_Avg  FROM yearmonth ym  INNER JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID  WHERE c.Currency = 'CZK'  AND c.Segment = 'SME'  AND SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013') AS SME_Avg,  (SELECT AVG(ym.Consumption) AS LAM_Avg  FROM yearmonth ym  INNER JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID  WHERE c.Currency = 'CZK'  AND c.Segment = 'LAM'  AND SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013') AS LAM_Avg,  (SELECT AVG(ym.Consumption) AS KAM_Avg  FROM yearmonth ym  INNER JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID  WHERE c.Currency = 'CZK'  AND c.Segment = 'KAM'  AND SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013') AS KAM_Avg  FROM dual;  SELECT SME_Avg - LAM_Avg AS SME_LAM_Diff,        LAM_Avg - KAM_Avg AS LAM_KAM_Diff,        KAM_Avg - SME_Avg AS KAM_SME_Diff FROM (SELECT       (SELECT AVG(ym.Consumption)        FROM yearmonth ym        INNER JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID        WHERE c.Currency = 'CZK'        AND c.Segment = 'SME'        AND SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013') AS SME_Avg,        (SELECT AVG(ym.Consumption)        FROM yearmonth ym        INNER JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID        WHERE c.Currency = 'CZK'        AND c.Segment = 'LAM'        AND SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013') AS LAM_Avg,        (SELECT AVG(ym.Consumption)        FROM yearmonth ym        INNER JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID        WHERE c.Currency = 'CZK'        AND c.Segment = 'KAM'        AND SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013') AS KAM_Avg) AS AvgConsumptions;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
7: customers.Segment,        MAX(percentage_increase) AS Max_Percentage_Increase,        MIN(percentage_increase) AS Min_Percentage_Increase FROM (     SELECT c.Segment,            ((SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) -              SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)) /             SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)) * 100 AS percentage_increase     FROM customers c     INNER JOIN yearmonth ym     ON c.CustomerID = ym.CustomerID     WHERE c.Currency = 'EUR'     AND (SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' OR SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013')     GROUP BY c.Segment ) AS results GROUP BY Segment;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
8: SUM(yearmonth.Consumption) AS TotalConsumption FROM yearmonth WHERE yearmonth.CustomerID = 6 AND yearmonth.Date >= '201308' AND yearmonth.Date <= '201311'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
9: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gasstations WHERE Country = 'CZE' AND Segment = 'Discount') - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gasstations WHERE Country = 'SVK' AND Segment = 'Discount') AS difference_in_discount_stations	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
10: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'CZK') - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'EUR') AS Difference FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME' AND (Currency = 'CZK' OR Currency = 'EUR')	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
11: SELECT (CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT ym.CustomerID) AS REAL) / COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID)) * 100 AS Percentage FROM customers c JOIN yearmonth ym ON c.CustomerID = ym.CustomerID WHERE c.Segment = 'LAM' AND ym.Consumption > 46.73;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
12: SELECT (CAST(COUNT(*) AS REAL) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM yearmonth WHERE Date = '201202')) * 100 AS percentage FROM yearmonth WHERE Date = '201202' AND Consumption > 528.3;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
13: max(yearmonth.Consumption) AS HighestConsumption FROM yearmonth WHERE substr(yearmonth.Date, 1, 4) = '2012'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
14: SELECT DISTINCT products.Description FROM products INNER JOIN transactions_1k ON products.ProductID = transactions_1k.ProductID INNER JOIN yearmonth ON transactions_1k.CustomerID = yearmonth.CustomerID WHERE yearmonth.Date = '201309';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
15: distinct gasstations.Country from gasstations inner join transactions_1k on gasstations.GasStationID = transactions_1k.GasStationID inner join yearmonth on transactions_1k.CustomerID = yearmonth.CustomerID where yearmonth.Date = '201306'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
16: count(distinct yearmonth.CustomerID) FROM customers INNER JOIN yearmonth ON customers.CustomerID = yearmonth.CustomerID WHERE customers.Currency = 'EUR' AND yearmonth.Consumption > 1000;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
17: products.Description FROM products INNER JOIN transactions_1k ON products.ProductID = transactions_1k.ProductID INNER JOIN gasstations ON transactions_1k.GasStationID = gasstations.GasStationID WHERE gasstations.Country = 'CZE';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
18: distinct transactions_1k.Date FROM transactions_1k INNER JOIN gasstations ON transactions_1k.GasStationID = gasstations.GasStationID WHERE gasstations.ChainID = 11	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
19: COUNT(*) FROM transactions_1k  INNER JOIN gasstations ON transactions_1k.GasStationID = gasstations.GasStationID  WHERE gasstations.Country = 'CZE' AND transactions_1k.Date > '2012-01-01'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
20: customers.Currency FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions_1k ON customers.CustomerID = transactions_1k.CustomerID WHERE transactions_1k.Time = '16:25:00' AND transactions_1k.Date = '2012-08-24'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
21: customers.Segment FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions_1k ON customers.CustomerID = transactions_1k.CustomerID WHERE transactions_1k.Date = '2012-08-23' AND transactions_1k.Time = '21:20:00'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
22: COUNT(*) FROM transactions_1k  INNER JOIN gasstations ON transactions_1k.GasStationID = gasstations.GasStationID  WHERE transactions_1k.Date = '2012-08-26'  AND transactions_1k.Time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '09:00:00'  AND gasstations.Country = 'CZE'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
23: gasstations.Country FROM transactions_1k INNER JOIN gasstations ON transactions_1k.GasStationID = gasstations.GasStationID WHERE transactions_1k.Date = '2012-08-24' AND transactions_1k.Amount = 548.4	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
24: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT t.CustomerID)) AS percentage FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions_1k t ON c.CustomerID = t.CustomerID WHERE t.Date = '2012-08-25' AND c.Currency = 'EUR'   This SQL query calculates the percentage of customers who used EUR on the date 2012-08-25. It joins the `customers` table with the `transactions_1k` table on the `CustomerID` field. The `WHERE` clause filters the transactions to include only those that occurred on '2012-08-25' and where the customer's currency is 'EUR'. The `COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID)` counts the unique customers who meet these criteria, and `COUNT(DISTINCT t.CustomerID)` counts all unique customers who made transactions on that date. The result is multiplied by 100.0 to convert it into a percentage.	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
25: ((SUM(y2012.Consumption) - SUM(y2013.Consumption)) / SUM(y2012.Consumption) * 100) AS ConsumptionDecreaseRate FROM yearmonth y2012 INNER JOIN yearmonth y2013 ON y2012.CustomerID = y2013.CustomerID WHERE y2012.Date = '2012' AND y2013.Date = '2013' AND y2012.CustomerID IN (     SELECT CustomerID     FROM transactions_1k     WHERE Date = '2012-08-25'     AND Amount = 634.8 );	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
26: SELECT (CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN Segment = 'Premium' THEN 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) * 100) AS percentage_premium FROM gasstations WHERE Country = 'SVK';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
27: SELECT SUM(transactions_1k.Amount * transactions_1k.Price) AS Total_Spent FROM transactions_1k WHERE transactions_1k.CustomerID = 38508 AND transactions_1k.Date BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2012-01-31';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
